subject: Creativity

hook.text: Picasso painted 50,000 works. Asimov wrote 500 books. Bach composed over 1,000 pieces.

discovery.text: Chuck Close nailed it: 'Inspiration is for amateurs. The rest of us just show up and get to work.

twist.text: Research shows that starting work PRODUCES inspiration, not the other way around. Action creates motivation.
